message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and my proposal aims to strike a balance that benefits us equally. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950000. This offer not only secures your acquisition of an asset that could potentially be worth much more but also ensures you a significant saving compared to its true market value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
